name: CongenitalCytomegalovirusTestsForCMVAntibody
title: Congenital Cytomegalovirus (Tests for CMV Antibody)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of CMV Antibody),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: CMV Antibody),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
